question: A 8 minutes scene from an hour long movie was cut due to copyright issues. What is the final length of the movie (in minutes)?
For an entire month of March, Josiah purchased 2 cookies each day. If each cookie costs 16 dollars. How much did Josiah spend on cookies in March
Lucy became headmaster of a school in the month of March. Lucy stayed headmaster for 3 months before retiring in the same year. In which month did Lucy retire?
Willow played football for 60 minutes and then played baseketball for 60 minutes. For how many hours did he play?
Nora paid for his watch in dimes. If the cost of watch was 9 dollars. Find the number of dimes Nora paid.
The newly constructed sports stadium is 62 yards in length. Addison has a measument device that measures only in feet. Find the length reported by Addison
Victoria tells his son that if there are a total of 20 bird wings in the sky, how many birds should be there?
Nolan decided to save 3k dollars every month for an entire year. Calculate the amount of money Nolan would have saved at the end of the year
Eli drew a line that was 1 m long. Then he realized that it a bit too long. So, he erased 33 cm of it. What is the length of the line(in cm) now?
In the entire football tournament, coin was tossed 10 times before the start of the match. Out of 10 times, Head came up 3 times. How many times did Tail come up?
Alice painted all the outer faces of some identical cuboids. If he painted a total of 36 faces, how many cuboids did he paint?
A weightlifter can lift 10 pounds in each of his hands. Find the total weight he can lift at once.
Mason wants to buy a gold ring for each of the index fingers of his spouse. If one ring costs 24 dollars. Find the amount Mason will have to pay.
Valentina bought a foot long burger and shared half with his brother. Find the share of each person in inches
Gabriel is prescribed to take diabetes capsules everyday. In the month of July, he forgot to take capsules on 3 days. Find out the count of his capsule intake in July.

Biology teacher notices that Nicholas is not paying attention in the class and asks him to report the number of insects in the laboratory if there are a total of 48 insect legs. What should be Nicholas's answer?

All Players in a local soccer club use one washing machine to wash their socks immediately after the match. If total number of socks in the washing machine is 22, then how many people played the match?

Sadie has to paint the inner faces of his room which is in the shape of a cuboid. Sadie painted $3 faces in the morning and left the rest for the evening. How many faces he will have to paint in the evening?
A group of 5 girls went to a spa for nail polishing. If each girl got all the fingers of both hands and legs polished. Find the total number of fingers the spa staff polished.

Greyson is a doctor, who went to operating theater at 3:20 pm to execute a 4 hr long operation. Greyson's sister came to meet Greyson at 6:35 pm, for how many minutes she had to wait in order to meet Greyson?

At the end of the month, Andrew was checking his expenses of November. He found that he spent a total of 465 dollars on eggs. Given that Andrew consumes equal number of eggs each day, find that number
The newly constructed sports stadium is 80 yards in length. Ivy has a measument device that measures only in feet. Find the length reported by Ivy
Eva wants to buy laces for his 26 pair of shoes. Find the total number of laces Eva will have to purchase.
Anna left India in the month of March, stayed in United States for 3 months before returning on the same date in a different month. In which month did he retire?
Harper and Jack are running a km long race. Harper finished the race when Jack was 152 meters from the start line. How many meters were Harper adn Jack apart?
A shopkeeper has 6 complete decks of playing cards and an additional 7 cards. How many cards does he have in total?
In a pond there are 20 frogs and 10 crocodile. Find the total number of animal eyes.
Joshua wants to buy a pen. The cost of pen is 6 dollars and Joshua has only 5 dollars in his pocket. He borrowed 68 cents from his neighbor. How many more cents Joshua needs now to purchase a pen?
Aiden takes a power nap of one fourth of an hour to freshen up. For how many minutes does he sleep?
In a car parking lot, Aria observed that there are 68 car wheels. Find out the number of cars in the parking lot.
Avery visited a rectangular park and noted down the number of 90 \degree angles. Then he went to a square field and counted the same. Find the sum of two numbers that Avery counted.

Biology teacher notices that Noah is not paying attention in the class and asks him to report the number of insects in the laboratory if there are a total of 36 insect legs. What should be Noah's answer?
Ava watched television for 4 hours. For how many minutes did he watch television?
Genesis has a wall clock in his home that rings every 3 hours. If it will first ring at 1 A.M, how many times will it ring in a day?
Alice started saving a penny every day. After how many days he would have saved 4 dimes in total?
Abigail painted all the outer faces of some identical cuboids. If he painted a total of 60 faces, how many cuboids did he paint?
A machine is cutting stem and processing apples. If I see 275 stems after 2 hrs, how many apples have been processed?
Caleb visited a rectangular park and noted down the number of 90 \degree angles. Then he went to a square field and counted the same. Find the sum of two numbers that Caleb counted.
Christopher observes that there are 4 spiders in his room. Find out the number of total number of spider legs.
The newly constructed sports stadium is 61 yards in length. Genesis has a measument device that measures only in feet. Find the length reported by Genesis

James goes to school at 12 pm. On Tuesday, James's classes are in the following order : Maths, History, Geography, Science and Music. Just now James's Science class got over. Can you estimate the time now in pm?
